channel.title: I Need Help On How To Make A Non-Hamachi Server
channel.description: hello. i know how to make a hamachi server but can someone please tell me or give me a link on how to make a server WITHOUT hamachi like so i can just put in my server like say: examplescape.no-ip.info. so can i please get some help with this that would be great. Thanks

item.title: I Need Help On How To Make A Non-Hamachi Server
item.dc:creator: @barrows_ftw1 barrows ftw
item.description:
@barrows_ftw1 wrote:

www.no-ip.com maybe? you need a router regardless of if your going to use no-ip or not

Read full topic
